unsolved: usability of model-generated multi-device user interfaces
scale: Near, personal space; Social space; Room
contribution_desc:
This paper contributes a usability study of model-generated user interfaces for different devices and platforms, in terms of satisfaction, effectiveness and efficiency. This paper should go in the pile of "multi-device user interface rendering/delivery", since there's no discussion about distribution or interaction.

Contribution: "multi-device" -> "study" -> "usability (model-generated UI)"
device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted to wall
